comments.content: I thought it was [Basilia](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919072409/http:/www.linotype.com/43114/basilia-family.html?subviewmode=FONTS&samplestr=You+deserve) but after carefully checking. I’m not sure anymore.
Thought it’s Pistilli Roman/Didoni. But no. It’s rather a Didot than a Bodoni, though.

I’d try something in the [Modern No. 20](http://web.archive.org/web/20080919072409/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/modern-no-20/) area: there are other fonts called “modern” in a similar vein that might be closer.

(But man, that hyphen in de- sign, it’s got to go!)

It’s ITC Modern 216 Heavy. Thanks elzadra!
